title: RESOLVED: Fixture files available
description:
Production API fixture files have been copied to tests/fixtures/.

## Files Available
```
tests/fixtures/
├── tl_ad_performance_prod.json      (451KB, 128 ads)
├── tl_adset_performance_prod.json   (240KB)
├── tl_campaign_performance_prod.json (46KB)
├── wh_ad_performance_prod.json      (84KB)
├── wh_adset_performance_prod.json   (39KB)
└── wh_campaign_performance_prod.json (24KB)
```

## Key Schema Fields (from production)
- `grade`: A/B/C/D
- `performance_segment`: winners, high_potential, underperformers, losers
- `recommended_action`: scale_budget, continue_monitoring, pause_and_review
- `Composite_Score`: float (weighted z-scores)
- `z_ctr`, `z_roas`, `z_cpa`, `z_cvr`: z-scores
- `days_active`: int
- `percentile_rank`: float (0 = top)

## Resolution
Fixtures copied from ~/Downloads/ on 2026-01-31.
